tasks.title: Set up project repo
tasks.description_full: Create Git repository, add README, configure CI/CD pipeline, and set branch protection rules.

tasks.title: Design task schema
tasks.description_full: Draft TypeScript TaskType, update JSON server fixtures, and ensure compatibility with front-end forms and validation.

tasks.title: Implement task list UI
tasks.description_full: Implement TaskList and TaskItem components, wire up props, handle selection and basic styling for responsive layout.

tasks.title: Add task creation form
tasks.description_full: Create task creation/edit form with client-side validation, priority selector, and due date picker integrated with state management.

tasks.title: Write unit tests
tasks.description_full: Add unit tests for TaskList, TaskItem, and form validation logic using the project's test framework; aim for good coverage.

tasks.title: Update documentation
tasks.description_full: Update README and API docs to reflect current endpoints, example requests/responses, and developer setup steps.

tasks.title: Code review and refactoring
tasks.description_full: Conduct code review sessions, identify areas for refactoring, improve code readability, and optimize performance where necessary.

tasks.title: Deploy to staging
tasks.description_full: Configure and deploy the application to a staging environment for further testing and stakeholder review.

tasks.title: User feedback collection
tasks.description_full: Set up mechanisms to collect user feedback on the task management features, including surveys and direct interviews.
